name: pytest-style-guide
description: Pytest test code style guidelines for Tactics2D project

actions.message:
Pytest test file created. Consider following Tactics2D test style guidelines:
1. Use function-style tests with pytest markers (required)
2. Organize imports: standard libs → third-party libs → project modules
3. Add descriptive docstrings for test functions
4. All test functions must have pytest markers (@pytest.mark.*)
5. Follow black formatting (line-length=100)
6. Use simple assert statements with clear conditions

Pytest test file modified. Review test style guidelines:
- Import order consistency
- Test function naming and docstrings
- Documentation clarity
- Assertion simplicity
- Pytest marker usage (required for all test functions)
